title: (x) Sygno Club - Agency, ITC Bolt, Blippo {Ignacio, Jan, Metadox}
content:
This looks like an easy one but I can't seem to find it anywhere.   
Does anyone know what the name of three fonts used in this image is called and where i can find it at? Please help!   
Thanks.   
 ![My fonts](http://web.archive.org/web/20050516224644im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/42640.jpg)
author: sauron

comments.content: The white one looks like [FB Agency Black Regular or Condensed](http://web.archive.org/web/20050516224644/http:/www.fontbureau.com/fonts/font_frames.tpl?cart=1037207551413963&fontname=AgencyFB).

The overall forms makes me suspect this is a customized   
 [ITC Bolt](http://web.archive.org/web/20050516224644/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/itc-bolt/bolt/testdrive.html?s=Sygno%2BClub&p=72)

Thanks all!   
   
One font pending.   
   
Anyone know what the font of the text "sexta feira"???

"Sexta Feira" looks like the long lost Blippo Bold. The only digital version I know of is called "Graphics", from the Quick Brown Fox (formerly B & P Graphics) [Designer Collection](http://web.archive.org/web/20050516224644/http:/www.qbf.de/dceng.htm). There may be other versions floating around, but I don't know about them. Most major foundries only have Blippo Black.
